Retargeting is a No Brainer

Bring back lost customers. Even if your website’s conversion rate is more than 2x the average, you’re still losing 90% of your website traffic. If you’re not retargeting, you’re missing out on one of the most cost-effective marketing channels.

Matic Reach is your retargeting partner. We leverage programmatic technology to distribute your ads to your website visitors across 20+ inventory exchanges, allowing you to extend your brand’s reach and generate conversions.

“Retargeting Generates Strongest Lift Compared to Other Targeting Strategies”

Beyond Just Google

With Matic Reach’s programmatic retargeting solution, your ads are distributed across more than 20 exchanges, including the Google Display Network. This translates to significantly expanded reach, ad placement options, and buying efficiency.

Example exchanges:

  • Google Display Network
  • Pubmatic
  • Nexage
  • Rubicon
  • Openx
  • Indexexchange
  • Sovrn
  • Mopub
  • Appnexus
  • Aoladtech
  • Smaato
  • Pulsepoint
  • Media6
  • Brightroll
  • Google Video
  • Google adx

Premium Creative Services

Don’t have the team or resources to create beautiful and effective ads? Matic Reach offers premium creative services to ensure your offer resonates with and engages your audience.

  • HTML5 Banners
  • Native
  • Video
  • Static Banners

Managed services

Every business that engages with Matic Reach receives a dedicated account manager that ensures your retargeting program is tailored to your business model. With custom conversion windows, algorithm based bidding strategies, and programmatic buying across display, native, and video, there are no limits to your retargeting success.
